simulation

Class Water

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.Water
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Water
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The complete water system will simulate both water flowing down to a lower position and the dissipation through dry ground. This is also a container for the clouds which extends the simulation with rain and evaporation.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    OSM Group 5 - DollyWood project

      • drawGroundWaterLevel

        public boolean drawGroundWaterLevel(int x,
                           int y,
                           float ammount)
        Removes amount of water from the ground at (x,y)
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        ammount -
        Returns:
        true if there was enough water to remove, false otherwise. Note that it will not remove anything if the function returns false.
